reviewText: The children today enjoy the Pound Puppies like the children of 25 years ago!

This is another great DVD for the Pound Puppies fan! My girls love seeing the interaction, friendship and more that are a part of each episode. I can say as a dad that I really loved the messages that were shared in each of the episodes on this DVD. The show is family-friendly, fun-loving and you and your kids will have a ton of fun watching and sharing this together.

*I received this for review - all opinions are my own*
